posts.name: Audrey Jane's Pizza Garage
posts.note: Audrey Jane's Pizza Garage is a family-owned and operated pizza parlor focusing on fresh ingredients and delicious flavors. Their pizzas are made lovingly in-house and from scratch. Order the Spicy Pig pizza which consists of hand-crushed tomato sauce, mozzarella, natural casing pepperoni, Italian sausage, roasted jalapeños, fresh garlic, oregano. Or the Meatball Grinder which contains homemade meatballs, mozzarella, hand-crushed tomato sauce, and oregano or the Eggplant Grinder with roasted eggplant, ricotta, garlic, hand-crushed tomato sauce, mozzarella, Parmesan cheese, and basil. From their website, 'Audrey Jane's Pizza Garage is a family-owned and operated pizza parlor focusing on fresh ingredients and delicious flavors. With inspiration deriving from our own experiences in San Francisco, New York City, Italy, and our own food-driven upbringings, we hope to craft you the pizza you'll never forget. Our pizzas are made lovingly in-house and from scratch. Because we know that every ingredient counts, we refuse to settle for mediocre quality, instead opting for ingredients like organic greens and the freshest veggies.'

posts.name: Blue Sparrow Coffee
posts.note: Blue Sparrow Coffee is committed to their neighborhood, the people who work here and live here. They strive to serve you the best coffee in a friendly, comfortable environment. Blue Sparrow Coffee has partnered with local food providers bringing you the highest quality products from Enzo the Baker, Marczyk Fine Foods, and Genova's Biscotti.

posts.name: Denver Biscuit Company
posts.note: Denver Biscuit Company is a biscuit-based breakfast and sandwich shop set up inside the warehouse-like Atomic Cowboy bar. You need to order one of their biscuit sandwiches such as the club with fried chicken, bacon, and cheddar cheese or a biscuit French toast with sausage, egg, and cheese covered with maple syrup.

posts.name: The Post Chicken and Beer
posts.note: The Post Chicken and Beer is an upbeat, casual spot serving up fried chicken, comfort-food sides, plus local beer, and cocktails. You need to order the fried chicken and the chicken Chicharrones; fried chicken skin served with a pinto bean hummus. From their website, 'We brew beers that are gosh darn delicious and fry up the crispiest, juiciest hot chicken around. Our kitchen, run by chef Brett Smith, serves family-style comfort food cooked with the love of your grandma and the skill of a trained chef. Our award-winning beers have been purposefully crafted to pair perfectly with your meal. Featured by Guy Fieri on Food Network’s Diners, Drive-Ins, and Dives, our gluten-free fried bird is better than the rest. We took the time to do our homework and get the best equipment around so that our fried chicken is perfectly juicy and crispy every single time.' NOTE: They have multiple locations.

posts.name: Reunion Bread Co
posts.note: From the Reunion Bread Co website, 'Born in Venezuela and raised by Portuguese immigrants, Ismael De Sousa brings European baked breads and pastries to the River North neighborhood. De Sousa has lived and worked all over the world, from South Africa to England to Miami. The menu will include rustic sourdough loaves, sweet and savory pastries, toasts, a New Belgium Brewing beer-infused bread, and more that reflect the cultures he's experienced.'

posts.name: The Roost
posts.note: The Roost is a rustic-chic hangout with New American pub grub and local craft beers, along with live music and a rooftop bar. Order the banging cauliflower and the perfect pork sandwich.

posts.name: Skirted Heifer
posts.note: Skirted Heifer serves burger and bun options with choose-your-own toppings. Don't forget to go with fries and frozen custard in their funky digs. The restaurant focuses on not only grass-fed beef but grass finished beef. Not only for the nutritional factor but for taste. The Skirted Heifer decided to make their own condiments and sauces homemade. You should order the skirted heifer burger with fries.

posts.name: Steuben's Food Service
posts.note: Steuben's Food Service is a classic regional American favorite's place, and cocktails make up the menu at this buzzing, retro-style diner. You need to order the fried chicken with mashed potatoes, gravy, and biscuit.
